ExternalData.Subtitlesect: Optional Protocol to the Convention on the Rights of the Child on the involvement of children in armed conflict

TreatyText.Label: Text
TreatyText.Text: United Nations, Treaty Series, vol. 2173, p. 222; Doc.A/RES/54/263; and C.N.1031.2000.TREATIES-82 of 14 November 2000 [Rectification of the original of the Protocol (Arabic, Chinese, English, French, Russian and Spanish authentic texts)]; C.N.865.2001.TREATIES-10 of 13 September 2001 [Rectification of the original of the Protocol (Chinese, English, French, Russian and Spanish authentic texts)].

TreatyNote.Text: The Optional Protocol was adopted by resolution A/RES/54/263 of 25 May 2000 at the fifty-fourth session of the General Assembly of the United Nations. In accordance with its article 9?1), the Optional Protocol will be open for signature by any State that is a party to the Convention or has signed it.
